class contactpr.schemas.Contact(*, first_name: str, last_name: str, email: str, phone_number: str, birthday: date | None = None, additional_data: str | None = None, id: int)¶

Bases: ContactBase

Schema for representing a contact.

Inherits attributes from ContactBase and adds an ‘id’ attribute.

Attributes:

id (int): Unique identifier for the contact.
